title: orca_catalog_reporting_dummy Lambda Input (Granule Specific)
description: The output from the orca_catalog_reporting_dummy Lambda when retrieving reconciliation reports.

providerId.description: providerId that is provided by Cumulus. Unique.

collectionId.description: collectionId that is provided by Cumulus. Unique per providerId.

granuleId.description: granuleId that is provided by Cumulus. Unique per collectionId.

createDate.description: Date and time in UTC that the data was originally ingested into ORCA.

lastUpdate.description: Date and time in UTC that information was updated.

files.description: A list of files within the granule.

orcaLocation.description: ORCA S3 Glacier bucket the file resides in. TODO: Can we call that out in the name?

fileSize.description: Size in bytes of the file. From Cumulus ingest. TODO: Can we call that out in the name?

fileChecksum.description: Checksum hash of the file provided by Cumulus.

fileChecksumType.description: Hash type used to calculate the hash value of the file.

fileVersion.description: AWS provided version of the file.

orcaEtag.description: AWS provided etag of the versioned file. Semi unique.
